songs.title: გიორგობისთვე
songs.description: A folk song about the month of St. George

songs.title: მე ვარ და ჩემი ნაბადი
songs.description: A traditional Georgian folk song about a person and their nabadi (felt cloak)

songs.title: ბატონებო
songs.description: A traditional Georgian folk song about batonebi (folk deities)

songs.title: დალა კოჯას
songs.description: A traditional Svan folk song about Dala mountain

songs.title: მერისული
songs.description: A traditional Georgian folk song from the Merisi region

songs.title: მე აქაური არა ვარ
songs.description: A humorous folk song from Imereti region

songs.title: მრავალჟამიერ
songs.description: A traditional Georgian toast song wishing long life and prosperity

songs.title: შენ ხარ ვენახი
songs.description: A medieval Georgian hymn. It is dedicated to Georgia and the patronage of the Virgin Mary; it is also a prayer of praise to Mary in the Georgian Orthodox Church.
